events: Lost their sibling Heideric when Dodo was 4 and Heideric was 6.
Lost their sibling Dammas when Dodo was 5 and Dammas was 4.
Lost their sibling Erkenradis when Dodo was 9 and Erkenradis was 3.
Lost father at the age of 13
Lost wife Clementia when she gave birth to Reymbernus.
Lost their child Reymbernus when Reymbernus was 6 years old.
Lost their sibling Nellen when Dodo was 21 and Nellen was 24.
